name: The Diplomat (Nakade)
description:
The Diplomat

To Mr. Phillipe Delacroix,

Your nation writes to you in a time of great need. Our charge d'affaires in the enemy state of Konso has disappeared under mysterious circumstances. You have been selected to be his replacement.

Begin your preparations for departure immediately. The Merovian consulate in Konso has received notice that your term of service will begin on the 1st of June, 1942.

May the Almighty Eye gaze upon you with beneficience.

Yours sincerely,

Michel Caron

Foreign Minister

Republic of Merovia
